Information.Subtext: Store the stream ID to request
PTP master to slave offset in nanoseconds.
PTP slave to master offset in nanoseconds.
Display the number of lost packets on NIC1 PHY1.
Display the number of lost packets on NIC1 CPU1.
Display the number of lost packets on buffer between packet filter and RTP engine.
Display the number of lost packets on buffer between audio interface and RTP packet creator.
Display the number of lost packets on NIC2 PHY2.
Display the number of lost packets on NIC2 CPU2.
Display the number of lost packets on buffer between packet filter and RTP engine.
Display the number of lost packets on buffer between audio interface and RTP packet creator.
Display the bitrate for NIC 1 Rx.
Display the bitrate for NIC 2 Rx.
Display the bitrate for NIC 1+2 Rx.
Display the bitrate for NIC 1 Tx.
Display the bitrate for NIC 2 Tx.
Display the bitrate for NIC 1+2 Tx.
IP address currently being polled by DataMiner.
Semicolon-delimited string of IP addresses for selecting dynamically polled IP.
PTP clock priority 1: Clock with lower priority becomes grandmaster.
PTP clock priority 2: Clock with lower priority becomes grandmaster if PTP clock priority 1, grandmaster class, grandmaster accuracy and grandmaster offsetScaledLogVariance are identical.
PTP clock minimum delay request interval.
PTP clock minimum PDelay request interval.
PTP clock is one step clock.
PTP clock delay mechanism peer-to-peer or end-to-end.
Number of 1Gbit/s switches without PTP support between grandmaster and module.
Number of 100Mbit/s switches without PTP support between grandmaster and module
Enable multi-subscription of the same stream.
Display the status of each input stream.
IP address of audio stream on Port 2.
IP address of audio stream on Port 2.
Number of audio channels in stream.
Destination port of RTP packets in stream on port 1.
Destination port of RTP packets in stream on port 2.
Destination port of RTCP packets in stream on port 1.
Destination port of RTCP packets in stream on port 2.
First channel in matrix where the audio input is placed.
Activate a backup stream on connection lost.
Timeout for switching to a backup stream on connection lost in seconds.
Offset in samples / Sample buffer size.
Stream name/session name in SDP and for RTSP URL/SIP URL.
Display the status of the stream output.
Display the unicast stream output status.
Destination port for RTP packets for stream on port 1.
Destination port for RTP packets for stream on port 2.
Destination port for RTCP packets for stream on port 1.
Destination port for RTCP packets for stream on port 2.
Destination IP for stream on port 1.
Destination IP for stream on port 2.
Number of samples per packet on stream.
Display the SIP server URL on port 2.

Changes.NewFeature: Add support for PTP (PTP Lock Status parameter)

Changes.Fix: Solve issue with incorrect values of PTP Offset.

Changes.Change: Change parsing of response for new firmware

Changes.Fix: Network Traffic updated to correct values

Changes.Change: PTP Parameters filled with fixed set of values if profile is not Customized

Changes.NewFeature: Add dynamic polling feature based on device's Port 1 & Port 2 IP addresses.
